hx019.01 Team Up: Colossus, Emma Frost, Magik, Namor
Rarity: Rare
Looking for Inventory Management? Please Login w/ "Remember Me?" option selected.
Special Powers
TEAM UP: COLOSSUS, EMMA FROST, MAGIK, NAMOR: If 1+ listed friendly characters are on the map, Cyclops and listed friendly characters can use Colossal Stamina. If Cyclops and all listed friendly characters are on the map, they can use Invulnerability, Defend and the Mystics team ability. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name).
Trade Team Up: Colossus, Emma Frost, Magik, Namor Want Team Up: Colossus, Emma Frost, Magik, Namor

October 11, 2021
tidge
It's been some time, but the (expected) errata for the Emma Frost Hellfire Club team-up now only gives the X-Men keyword to allies when she is part of a Hellfire Club theme team. A 400-point (keyword) version of the team can be made with the Wolverine/Cyclops Regenesis dial(s), otherwise there aren't cost-effective keyword choices. The XMRF 013 Colossus has a couple of great starting lines; if stuck on points the prime 2x2 can join the team for 25 points.
February 26, 2021
tidge
I'm disappointed that the benefits of the card go away when any one of the team falls, although there are ways around that by using the HX Emma to use Krakoan Revival. It's nice that it is possible to make a 400-point team of the Phoenix 5, but one of the best looking variants includes two chase figures (Namor, Magic) and the Emma Frost TUC that can give the chase CAAV Namor the X-Men keyword (so he can boost keyword allies)
January 22, 2021
machineman
Jeez, this card adds a whole lotta extra, when fielding the full named force. Pretty neat, I think.
